channel.title: Aim on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Aim on ZooBerry

item.title: Terrain Reskin Pack
item.description: Updates the biome textures for the alpine, grassland, temperate forest, tropical rainforest, and wetlands biomes.

item.title: Iberian Wolf
item.description: The Iberian wolf (Canis lupus signatus) is a critically endangered wolf native to Portugal and Spain.
